page.title: 05TOURIST TOWN WATER SUPPLY
page.content: The main trees are deciduous,(which drop their leaves in Winter),these include willow,hawthorn,sycamore,oak, ash,alder,silver birch and beech.There are also a few conifers like firs. {PORTH RESERVOIR}is used for fishing because of the brown trout there. To fish you have a long rod, running across which is a fishing line. Only fly fishing is allowed whereby the fisherman casts out his line baited with a fly selected in order to attract the trout.The number of fish is carefully monitored to make sure that the lake is well stocked,and only the larger fish may be removed when caught. Porth resevoir is used for supplying Newquay with water for drinking and washing and for boating. The hedgerows in square 8762 consist mostly of grass, ferns, wild shrubs, dandelions and nettles.
